title: List of champions that need a rework

replies.body: so much salt

Most people won't understand the salt until its their turn for a complete VGU

The lack of complaints & rant threads along with a low ban/pick rate made me think Malzahar was always going to be there for me after work... Until low quality mass class reworks were a thing.

I'll never forget patch 6.9 nor the silence from repertoire on the subject for 1.5 or so years afterwards :/

And it doesn't help that the way Riot does things is to do extreme things to make everyone unhappy, so that when they dial things back to what they probably actually wanted, people would be relatively happy... With only the most dedicated mains crying in the corner.

I wouldn't be surprised if this current Atrox is just a ploy to purposefully make him hated, so when they do QoL buffs, AAtrox will be forgotten just like every other VGU champion, referenced only in arguments a couple years from now and being told AAtrox has "always" been cancer which is why he was changed.

Because that was what my experience watching pre-rework Malzahar's reputation get ground into the dirt simply for being similar to the cancerous reworked version of him was like.
So much this^ Nail on the head dude. Remember how Galio's rework was all the craze? Now no one could care less but the ones who actually played him feeling like crap.

> Most people won't understand the salt until its their turn for a complete VGU

Honestly, as a Vlad main, I would love it if Riot gave him a full VGU, because maybe then they wouldn't nerf him if he ever sees pro play.

inb4 Vladimir becomes a bruiser that uses blood but has no lifesteal/sustain.

jk jk

Judging by how they changed Vlad in the Mage update they'd probably leave in his sustain but make it a lot more conditional. Like the Crimson Rush system creates windows where he's strong (he has Crimson Rush) and where he's weak (he does not). Now if they could make more of his spells interact with Crimson Rush (spending it at 2 stacks and building it when used) that would be even better, because then Vlad has to decide whether or not he should use the Crimson Rush stack on a Transfuse (to heal) or one of his other spells for some additional effect.

Riot is nerfing vlad? When? Where? 
That 0,2 AP ratio from fully charged E? 
Oh wow. 
This champ shouldnt be viable at all. 
Yet he is THE best champ in every role.

That's -250 damage lategame, which is massive.

He also doesn't have >50% winrate in any role.

they fucked up taric

and I have only seen complaints about the "NEW" AA batteries trox.

I honestly think Taric's rework was an improvement, gameplay wise he gained a higher skill ceiling. Tarics visuals and lore are very good too, his personality stayed the same too and atleast from what I remember people were satisfied with it when it came out. The only complaint I really saw was that the ult was just added on, and I did like the old Taric ult but it was really underwhelming. New Taric ult is interesting and adds onto his thematic more as a protector.
Yeah, like, what, there are maybe some questionable reworks, but Taric?? Really??

They could've just added a new champion with taric's kit and nobody would blink an eye. 
EVERYTHING about his kit is different exept: he still has a SOME kind of stun and SOME kind of healing, so half a Q and E. That adds up to 1?
in 5 abilities they didnt change 1. cool and good

That's what happens when you have some of the most basic abilities you can give a champion. 

A heal. 
A stun. 
Aoe Stat Aura.

The only interesting/unique thing he had himself, was the armor passive and armor shatter, but even then, it's a conflict in identity to have such a heavy support character also shredding opponent armor.
He shredded his own armor as well iirc by using the W since he "lost" his bonus armor from the passive.

yep taric.
went from 3 damaging abilities to 1.
can you please tell me your opinion on why the rework was not questionable?

Cause he's a support, and his damage was shifted into more utility options, while retaining the CD lowering from his old autos into his passive, which makes up a good portion of his lane damage. My Brother loves playing him top, before and after the rework, and it still plays the same way.
can I have a name please, I would like to investigate this

ninjalord433, though admittedly, the fights I was referencing were of a longer time ago, back when his rework came out, around up to when he got the change to his Q to have up to 5 charges. 

The main point I'm getting out, is that Taric relatively plays the same. Sure, he lost a lot of his abilities, but that was because they were bare bones of an ability. Stun, Heal, AOE Aura of Stats, the only real thing he had unique to him was his Armor and Armor shatter. They had a lot of room to change things that were, frankly, basic.

I couldn't find anything with that name, maybe a spelling error or the games were too long ago.

taric was reworked around 2 years ago, when we still had the old runes and masteries.
with full scaling armor and some good masteries to choose from.
but now especially with the new runes, damage was increased and defense options were lowered.
build tank and you get bursted by anyone with conqueror.
build damage and you will get bursted by assasins and/or lane against someone with a dash. (mostly everyone)
taric playing relatively the same now as he did 2 years ago? he has fallen massively
again, he went from dealing damage to "ignore the taric, focus the damage" in team fights

let us go back now to taric and the laning phase.
assuming taric went top lane. which match ups would he win, or even if he did lose the early, would win late?
gnar? ranged, also has a hop
gangplank? melee, but can easily eat an orange and walk away from the stun before taric can auto
Chogath? melee, but is ap. can knockup taric pretty easily unless he flashes.
ornn? melee, has a shield, can build items in lane.
Camille? melee, hookshot, gains a shield base off what type of dmg did the most damage
vlad? ranged, pool, no mana costs.
sion? has a shield, hard to miss knockup (as taric has no dashes(could stun, but sion can use it again in 2 seconds))
maokai? melee, ap, can dodge stun with root, can also just knock taric away.
shen? melee, but of tarics damage is auto attacks. with a skill that blocks auto attacks, not looking good.
trundle? melee, easy knockaway from taric with pillar
Lucian? is AD, but ranged and has a dash
jayce? melee and ranged, knockback and a speedup, taric isn't gonna come close unless jayce wants it
kled? melee, with skarl passive, taric isn't gonna be able to knock him off his lizard and kill him before skarl comes back
yasuo? melee, ad, windwall will not block the stun, but with the dashes and the passive shield, isn't gonna kill him either
illoai? melee, but wants taric to be in melee range
darius? good luck trying to burst him down, 1 q hits, your in trouble
urgot? melee, go ahead, get close to him
fiora? melee, same as urgot
poppy? I can see him winning this one pre 6, once level 6, if taric does more damage to her, she is just gonna ult him away
swain? HAHAHA, nope.

> assuming taric went top lane.

Why the fuck would you bring Taric top? Old or new.

Stun? Just play Pantheon.
Heal? Just play Gangplank.
Invulnerability? Just play Kayle.
Bonus Armor Resistance? Just play Malphite.

There's literally billions of other champions better to play than Taric.

new taric is terrible XD
but believe it or not, old taric was better.
by building armor (similar to malphite, rammus,) you increased your damage
he also had an armor aura, all allies close by get an armor bonus
and that same ability (once activated) decreased the armor of the enemy units
finally his ult gave his team attack power and ability power
-----
activating w and r increased your already amazing damage
something that is very lacking in the new one

taric went from a fighter to a babysitter.
he only has 1 source of dmg, and has to really on auto attacks.
also his damaging ability has a delay. cast the spell, and hope the enemy doesn't have a dash/flash up.
gets better if he is paired with another ally, which means he has to go bot lane. (or if gold funneling hit R)
he needs TIME, and a lot of it to do any damage. hard to do when you die in 4 seconds.

TL;DR
where the damage at?
Disagree, different champ now. And regardless of it being done for "muh balance" it's less fun to play making it worse by that alone. Don't have a problem with visual updates though.
Do you even remember old taric? That kit was so bad, old and in DIRE need of a tune up.

O, We Do
this new kit is WORSE than the last one,
a tune up I will take, taking off half of the screws I will not

Point & Click Heal vs AoE spammable Heal.

Point & Click Stun vs AoE Stun that comes from two different source (Taric & his dick-buddy)

A Sona Aura-Stat passive on his ult vs a delayed AoE Invulnerability that can change the course of the fight.

"Worse", my ass.
Don't mind the other guy, he's just salty.
